thread.section_title: Car Hire Labs Bewertungen | Kundenbewertungen von Car Hire Labs | www.carhirelabs.com
thread.title: Barry. May
thread.title_full: Car Hire Labs bewertet von Barry. May

author: Barry. May
title: Barry. May
text: So far the process has been straightforward, prompt & trouble-free. The voucher came through quickly & with warnings to read the contract for suitability. The small print in the contract is, happily, reasonably short (compared with others) & in plain language. Like most reviewers, I am still apprehensive about any charges that might be imposed at the actual time of hiring - e.g. the infamous total waiver insurance - I'm intending to take out a standalone policy before I hire but will this be deemed 'acceptable' on the day by staff at Alamo? I can't fault Car Hire Labs, though, in any respect.
